textContent:
---intro---

Full disclosure, I'm not writing this on valentines. I'm writing this on monday, Feb. 12, while you are still sleeping, so that I could experience the full brunt of missing you hahaha. I had a hard time thinking of things to write in this letter, which is very weird because really, I could write lots just thinking about you. 

Though, lol, now that I actually started writing hahahahah, the ideas actually flood right in T.T HAHAHAHAHHA. So baka need lang talaga na magsulat ako sa time na busy/tulog ka para ramdam na ramdam ko pagkakamiss sayo HAHAHA. 

So. Valentine's Day. 

---love letter---

To my dearest Rei,

I am so lucky I get to spend Valentine's day with you, the girl who had everything I could ask for. I know I've said it a thousand times before, but I just want to reiterate how lucky I believe I am that I found you, how unreal it feels to be in a relationship with you, and how divine it is to be in love with someone like you.

While writing this letter, I then got to thinking about Stephen Sanchez's "Until I Found You" again. I used to not believe in the song's message because I believed that we should fall in love over and over again with different people until you find the right person. However, I suddenly managed to see it in a different manner. Maybe it's not that the singer chooses not to fall in love, but just can't? Because he/she hasn't found real love yet. What if my love for you really is what love is supposed to be? It's easy. It's natural. It's comforting. It's secure. It's calm. It's happy. And therefore, it that were the case, then maybe I haven't fallen in love before until I found you?

I know. It's a longshot. There are different ways to love somebody and not all of them are full of fluff like ours. But I just want you to know, that my love for you has been the easiest thing in my life, Rei. Yes, I still have to put in effort but it's almost too easy even then. You make my heart melt with your mere presence. And maybe, just maybe, this might be what "love" is supposed to be? Maybe this is what Stephen Sanchez meant when he said that he will never fall in love until he found the right person? Maybe the type of love that he meant was a type of love that is easy, natural, and comforting. Just like what I feel for you. Okay, I'll stop overanalyzing that song now lol. 

This will be first Valentine's day that we spend together Rei, and I am sure that it wont be the last time we spend this occasion together. However, since this would be the first, it still makes it special doesn't it? I'll try my best to make it memorable Rei. Today and in our official Valentine's date (17th), I'll try to give you loads of fun and memories that we'll treasure for the rest of our lives. I love you so so so much babycakes.


---intro 2---

And now I'm ending this letter, in the morning of the 13th. We called for hours yesterday!!! (Almost 3 hrs) You look really beautiful in your new haircut and it makes feel so giddy and happy that I get to be your boyfriend! I feel really special, and lucky, and blessed. J. Christ, why do you get even more beautiful every time I see you? My poor heart can't take it. You make it beat so fast. 


---love poem---

To Rei, my sunlight, ever so gleaming,
You are the reason I wake in the morning.
I thank you, for making me the happiest,
For making me a better person, filled with jest.

To Rei, my moonlight, always so soothing,
You are the reason my sleep is calming,
I thank you, for giving me comfort and security,
With you by my side, I could fight destiny.

When my heart beats, know that it beats for you.
When the birds sing, I feel its you they sing to.
The sun rises, so that I could once again see you,
The moon shines, so that I could peacefully dream of you.

To Rei, my very own dearest princess.
To Rei, my most beautiful best girl.
To Rei, my adorable thoughtful bestie.
To Rei, my always loved and treasured partner.
I love you.
Happy Valentines!
